channel.title: Docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668 Comments
channel.description: Public comments on regulations.gov docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668: Federal Implementation Plan Addressing Regional Ozone Transport for the 2015 Primary Ozone National Ambient Air Quality Standard

item.title: 13 New Comments on Docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668 on 2023-11-14
item.description:
On 2023-11-14, 13 new public comments were posted for docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668 (Federal Implementation Plan Addressing Regional Ozone Transport for the 2015 Primary Ozone National Ambient Air Quality Standard).

13 New Comments

  1. Comment submitted by Ozone Transport Commission (OTC)
  2. Comment submitted by Power Generators Air Coalition (PGen)
  3. Comment submitted by Alabama Power Company and PowerSouth Energy Cooperative
  4. Comment submitted by Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA)
  5. Comment submitted by Clean Air Task Force, Earthjustice, Environmental Defense Fund, and Sierra Club
  6. Comment submitted by Interstate Natural Gas Association of America (INGAA)
  7. Comment submitted by PacifiCorp
  8. Comment submitted by Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources (WDNR)
  9. Comment submitted by Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection.
  10. Comment submitted by Teona Mosley
  11. Comment submitted by Ohio EPA
  12. Comment submitted by American Forest & Paper Association, Inc., et al.
  13. Comment submitted by Alabama Department of Environmental Management

item.title: 19 New Comments on Docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668 on 2023-09-01
item.description:
On 2023-09-01, 19 new public comments were posted for docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668 (Federal Implementation Plan Addressing Regional Ozone Transport for the 2015 Primary Ozone National Ambient Air Quality Standard).

19 New Comments

  1. Comment submitted by The Luminant Companies
  2. Comment submitted by Department of Justice, State of Louisiana
  3. Comment submitted by Sierra Club, et al.
  4. Comment submitted by Mississippi Department of Environmental Quality (MDEQ) and Mississippi Power Company (MPC)
  5. Comment submitted by Commonwealth of Kentucky, Energy and Environmental Cabinet, Division for Air Quality
  6. Comment submitted by Interstate Natural Gas Association of America (INGAA)
  7. Comment submitted by Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources (WDNR)
  8. Comment submitted by Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ)
  9. Comment submitted by Minnesota Good Neighbor Coalition
  10. Comment submitted by American Forest & Paper Association, Inc., et al.
  11. Comment submitted by Texas Pipeline Association (TPA)
  12. Comment submitted by East Kentucky Power Cooperative, Inc. (EKPC)
  13. Comment submitted by Louisiana Chemical Association (LCA) and Louisiana Mid-Continent Oil and Gas Association (LMOGA)
  14. Comment submitted by Richard Spotts
  15. Comment submitted by Monongahela Power Company (Mon Power)
  16. Comment submitted by Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA)
  17. Comment submitted by Association of Electric Companies of Texas, et al.
  18. Comment submitted by Power Generators Air Coalition (PGen)
  19. Comment submitted by United States Steel Corporation
